gcube.setAGcubeRotationAngle|block: set rotation angle to $rotationAngle of the Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.setAGcubeServoAngle|block: set servo motor angle to $servoAngle of the Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.setAGcubeSpeed|block: set motor speed to $motorSpeed of the Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.setAllGcubeRotationAngle|block: set each Gcube rotation angle| Gcube0 = $r0| Gcube1 = $r1| Gcube2 = $r2| Gcube3 = $r3| Gcube4 = $r4| Gcube5 = $r5| Gcube6 = $r6| Gcube7 = $r7
gcube.setAllGcubeServoMotorAngle|block: set each Gcubes servo motor angle| Gcube0 = $a0| Gcube1 = $a1| Gcube2 = $a2| Gcube3 = $a3| Gcube4 = $a4| Gcube5 = $a5| Gcube6 = $a6| Gcube7 = $a7
gcube.setAllGcubeSpeed|block: set each Gcube motor's speed| Gcube0 = $s0| Gcube1 = $s1| Gcube2 = $s2| Gcube3 = $s3| Gcube4 = $s4| Gcube5 = $s5| Gcube6 = $s6| Gcube7 = $s7
gcube.setMatrixBlinkRate|block: set blink rate $blinkRate Hz matrix of the Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.setMatrixDisplay|block: set matrix image of the Gcube $cn $t1 $t2 $t3 $t4 $t5 $t6 $t7 $t8
gcube.showMessageOnMatrix|block: show $matrixMessage on the matrix of Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.startRollingMatrixImage|block: start rolling matrix image for $duration seconds
gcube.startShiftingMatrixImage|block: start shifting matrix image for the Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.stopAllGcubeMotor|block: stop all of the Gcube's motor
gcube.turnOffMatrix|block: turn off x $xPos y $yPos dotmatrix of Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.turnOnMatrix|block: turn on x $xPos y $yPos dotmatrix of Gcube $cubeIndex
gcube.waitFirstGcubeConnect|block: wait until the first Gcube is connected
